amarillo.meetingHighlights: Community-oriented meetings with active groups downtown and in the Sunset Acres area; steady attendance at noon and evening meetings.
amarillo.transitInfo: City bus service and regional roads; Rick Husband Amarillo International Airport (AMA) for flights.

arlington.neighborhoods: Downtown Arlington, Entertainment District, North Arlington, South Arlington, East Arlington
arlington.meetingHighlights: Multiple neighborhood meetings and campus-area groups; convenient speaker meetings near the Entertainment District.
arlington.transitInfo: Served by DART and Trinity Metro connections in the DFW metro; Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport (DFW) nearby.

austin.neighborhoods: Downtown, South Congress (SoCo), Zilker, East Austin, Hyde Park, Mueller
austin.meetingHighlights: Vibrant AA scene with many university-area and downtown meetings, a large offering of Big Book and speaker meetings.
austin.transitInfo: CapMetro buses and light rail serve Austin; Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (AUS) for flights.

brownsville.meetingHighlights: Close-knit community meetings often held in neighborhood churches and community centers with bilingual groups available.
brownsville.transitInfo: Local bus routes and regional highway access; Brownsville/South Padre Island area airports serve the region.

corpus-christi.neighborhoods: Downtown, North Beach, Southside, Flour Bluff, Padre Island, Calallen
corpus-christi.meetingHighlights: Strong waterfront and Southside meeting presence with varied meeting formats including speaker and step-study groups.
corpus-christi.transitInfo: Local bus and shuttle services; Corpus Christi International Airport (CRP) for flights.

dallas.neighborhoods: Downtown, Deep Ellum, Uptown, Oak Lawn, Oak Cliff, Bishop Arts District
dallas.meetingHighlights: Extensive meeting calendar across neighborhoods with strong LGBT and Spanish-language meetings in Oak Lawn and multiple nightly meetings downtown.
dallas.transitInfo: DART light rail and buses serve the metro; Love Field (DAL) and Dallas/Fort Worth International (DFW) airports nearby.

el-paso.neighborhoods: Downtown, Lower Valley, East El Paso, West El Paso, Kern Place, Ysleta
el-paso.meetingHighlights: Bilingual meetings and strong neighborhood groups; regular speaker meetings and recovery events tied to the border community.
el-paso.transitInfo: Sun Metro bus services; El Paso International Airport (ELP) for regional flights.

fort-worth.neighborhoods: Downtown, Cultural District, Near Southside, West 7th, TCU area, Alliance
fort-worth.meetingHighlights: Active groups near TCU and downtown with a mix of closed and open meetings; community events and speaker nights are common.
fort-worth.transitInfo: Trinity Metro buses and TEXRail connections; served by DFW and nearby regional airports.

houston.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Montrose, The Heights, River Oaks, Galleria
houston.meetingHighlights: Large, diverse fellowship with many Spanish-language and specialty meetings; active downtown and neighborhood groups.
houston.transitInfo: METRO buses and light rail serve the city; George Bush Intercontinental (IAH) and William P. Hobby (HOU) airports for travel.

irving.neighborhoods: Las Colinas, Valley Ranch, Irving Heights
irving.meetingHighlights: Several workplace and evening meetings serving the Las Colinas business district and residential neighborhoods.
irving.transitInfo: DART light rail and bus connections; Irving is adjacent to Dallas Fort Worth International Airport (DFW).

laredo.neighborhoods: Downtown, San Isidro, West Laredo, Mall area, Rio Bravo, Del Mar Heights
laredo.meetingHighlights: Community meetings often held in bilingual formats with steady local attendance and recovery outreach.
laredo.transitInfo: Local bus service and proximity to U.S.–Mexico border crossings; Laredo International Airport for regional travel.

lubbock.meetingHighlights: College-area meetings and a strong evening meeting schedule; community groups centered downtown and near Texas Tech.
lubbock.transitInfo: Citibus public transit and regional road access; Lubbock Preston Smith International Airport (LBB) nearby.

mcallen.neighborhoods: Downtown McAllen, Palmview (nearby), North McAllen, South McAllen, Los Ebanos, Sharyland
mcallen.meetingHighlights: Regional RGV meetings with bilingual offerings and active weekend recovery events drawing attendees from nearby cities.
mcallen.transitInfo: Valley Metro and regional bus services; McAllen Miller International Airport (MFE) for regional travel.

mckinney.meetingHighlights: Growing suburb with new groups forming in historic downtown and planned communities; weekday evening meetings are common.
mckinney.transitInfo: Regional DART connections and major highway access; Dallas-area airports within a short drive.

midland.meetingHighlights: Oilfield-region meetings with evening and weekend options; often combined events with Odessa groups.
midland.transitInfo: Local and regional road networks; Midland International Air and Space Port (MAF) serves regional flights.

odessa.meetingHighlights: Shared meeting calendar with Midland; strong local participation and several evening groups.
odessa.transitInfo: Regional road access and Midland/Odessa nearby airport; local transit options are limited.

plano.neighborhoods: Downtown, Willow Bend, Legacy West, West Plano
plano.meetingHighlights: Suburban groups with many weekday meetings and a number of lunchtime options for commuters.
plano.transitInfo: DART bus services and nearby rail connections; Dallas airports within commuting distance.

richardson.neighborhoods: Downtown Richardson, Galatyn Park, Spring Valley
richardson.meetingHighlights: Convenient weekday and evening meetings for tech and university communities in the area.
richardson.transitInfo: DART rail and bus access; close to I-75 and other major corridors for regional travel.

san-antonio.neighborhoods: Downtown, Pearl District, Alamo Heights, Southtown, North Central, King William
san-antonio.meetingHighlights: Large and diverse meeting offerings across the city including military base outreach and numerous Spanish-language meetings.
san-antonio.transitInfo: VIA Metropolitan transit buses serve the metro; San Antonio International Airport (SAT) for flights.
